title: News24.com | Coronavirus | Gauteng health department consulting with private hospital groups as cases rise in province
description: The Gauteng Department of Health says that it is still in consultation with private hospital groups for resources, while the number of confirmed cases continues to rise in the highly populated province.
content:
The Gauteng Department of Health says that it is still in consultation with private hospital groups for resources, while the number of confirmed cases continues to rise in the highly populated province.
"We have been in engagements with the private sector to… [+2306 chars]
